title: Extra Storage, Intrusion Alarms Available for Monitoring*
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 26', 'OR Text', '26', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 642 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Helios!', 'We’re an apartment community built for an Englewood lifestyle of social afternoons, daily exercise, and relaxing in your luxurious home.', 'Virtually tour our one- and two-bedroom floor plans with their high ceilings and private patios / balconies - move about the spacious interiors, and welcome in the outside air every day you’re with us.', 'Our residents have access to the amenities they need to meet the lifestyle they deserve.', 'Our community features a fitness center with weights and cardiovascular training equipment, an on-site technology hub, our off-leash dog park, and a sparkling pool.', 'Our community is located in the heart of the Denver Tech Center with Marina Square and Belleview Promenade at your doorstep.', 'Features:', 'Stainless-steel Appliances*, Dishwasher and Disposal, Open Gourmet Kitchens with Island*, Granite Countertops*, Private Patio or Balconies, Ceiling Fans', 'Throughout, Extra Storage, 9- And 10-foot Ceilings*, Wide Plank Flooring*, Prewired with Fiber Optic and Cable, Washer and Dryer, Air Conditioner, Custom Wood Cabinets, Walk-in Closets, Intrusion Alarms Available for Monitoring*, Generously Sized Tubs and Shower with Tile Surrounds, Tile Backsplashes*', '*Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities:', '24/7 Package Concierge System, Business Center, Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace and Gas Grills, Fitness Center with Cardio and Weight Equipment, Night Patrol, Off-leash Dog Park, Conference Room For Meetings and Calls, Inviting Pool with Landscaped Sundecks, Technology Hub with Fully Connected Computer, Kitchens, Guest Room, Resident Lounge with Catering Kitchen and Bar, Controlled Access/Gated, Elevator, Onsite Management, Clubroom with Shuffleboard, Foosball, Pool Table and Large Screen TVs', 'Pet Policy', 'PET POLICY', 'We Love Pets!', 'Please review our pet policy.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'rcnDz4KB1']
